typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		entity as string,
		extid as integer,
		dvguid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductTextTypeGuids
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		CreateTimeSpan as timestamp,
		CreateUserId as integer,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		ModifyTimeSpan as timestamp,
		ModifyUserId as integer,
		ProductId as integer,
		ProductTextTypeId as integer,
		Description as string,
		Rowversion as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLProductTexts
source(output(
		entity as string,
		extid as integer,
		dvguid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductGuids
ProductTextTypeGuids filter(entity == 'cr01c_producttexttype') ~> FilterProductTextTypeGuids
FilterProductTextTypeGuids, SQLProductTexts join(extid == ProductTextTypeId,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTextTypeGuidstoProductTexts
JoinProductGuidstoProductTexts select(mapColumn(
		ProductTextTypeGuid = ProductTextTypeGuids@dvguid,
		Id,
		CreateTimeSpan,
		CreateUserId,
		IsDeleted,
		ModifyTimeSpan,
		ModifyUserId,
		ProductId,
		ProductTextTypeId,
		Description,
		Rowversion,
		ProductGuid = ProductGuids@dvguid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tmpProductTexts
ProductGuids filter(entity == 'cr01c_producttexttype') ~> FilterProductGuids
JoinTextTypeGuidstoProductTexts, FilterProductGuids join(ProductId == ProductGuids@extid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProductGuidstoProductTexts
tmpProductTexts sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		ProductId as integer,
		ProductTextTypeId as integer,
		Description as string,
		ProductTextTypeIdGUID as string,
		ProductIdGUID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Id,
		CreateTimeSpan,
		CreateUserId,
		IsDeleted,
		ModifyTimeSpan,
		ModifyUserId,
		ProductId,
		ProductTextTypeId,
		Description,
		ProductTextTypeIdGUID = ProductTextTypeGuid,
		ProductIdGUID = ProductGuid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinktmpProductTexts
